Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the movie 'Bbuddah... Hoga Terra Baap' (2011) and its soundtrack?
Options:
A. Amitabh Bachchan performed the title track 'Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap'.
B. Vishal Dadlani composed the music for the movie.
C. The title track features an acapella version.
D. The movie was released in 2010.
Answer: Amitabh Bachchan performed the title track 'Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap', Vishal Dadlani composed the music for the movie, The title track features an acapella version.

Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the soundtrack of the movie 'Bbuddah... Hoga Terra Baap' released in 2011?
Options:
A. The title track 'Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap' features a dub step version.
B. The soundtrack was composed by Vishal Dadlani.
C. Amitabh Bachchan performed a song in the movie.
D. The movie was released in 2010.

Question: Which of the following songs from the movie 'Bbuddah... Hoga Terra Baap' (2011) feature lyrics written by Swanand Kirkire and Anvita Dutt Guptan?
Options:
A. Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap
B. Haal-E-Dil
C. Shor Machega
D. Dil Se Re

Question: Which of the following songs from the movie 'Bbuddah... Hoga Terra Baap' (2011) feature vocals by Amitabh Bachchan?
Options:
A. Go Meera Go
B. Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap
C. Agar Main Kahoon
D. Shor Machega
Answer: Go Meera Go, Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap

Question: Which of the following songs from the movie 'Bbuddah... Hoga Terra Baap' (2011) feature vocals by Sunidhi Chauhan?
Options:
A. Main Chandigarh Di Star
B. Go Meera Go
C. Chamak Challo
D. Sheila Ki Jawani
Answer: Main Chandigarh Di Star, Go Meera Go

Question: Which of the following songs from the movie 'Bbuddah... Hoga Terra Baap' (2011) feature vocals by Amitabh Bachchan and Monali Thakur?
Options:
A. Haal-E-Dil
B. Go Meera Go
C. Chura Liya Hai Tumne Jo Dil Ko
D. Tum Hi Ho
